Package cscie259.project4.scamazon

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cart
    This servlet implements Scamazon.com's shopping cart.
    Catalog
    This servlet implements Scamazon.com's catalog.
    ECS
    This servlet implements a demonstration of Amazon's E-Commerce Service (ECS).
    Proxy
    Helper methods for Scamazon.com.
    ScamazonServlet
    Base class for Scamazon's servlets; defines as an inner class an ErrorListener.
    ScamazonServlet.AnErrorListener
    Handles processing errors.
